snippet: If being well rested was all Novak Djokovic needed to win the U.S. Open for his third grand slam title of the year, the world number one would have sailed through Sunday's final against Swiss Stan Wawrinka....
lead_paragraph: If being well rested was all Novak Djokovic needed to win the U.S. Open for his third grand slam title of the year, the world number one would have sailed through Sunday's final against Swiss Stan Wawrinka.

headline.print_headline: Despite Fresh Legs, Djokovic Fades in U.S. Open Final
headline.main: Despite Fresh Legs, Djokovic Fades in U.S. Open Final
